org.littleshoot.proxy

Interface ChainedProxyManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SSLContextSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChainedProxyManagerAdapter

    public interface ChainedProxyManager
extends SSLContextSource

    Interface for classes that manage chained proxies.

    Sub-classes may wish to extend ChainedProxyManagerAdapter for sensible defaults.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowFallbackToUnchainedConnection(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Indicate whether or not it's okay to fall back to an unchained connection.
      String getHostAndPort(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Return the host and port for the chained proxy to use.
      TransportProtocol getTransportProtocol()
      Tell LittleProxy what kind of TransportProtocol to use to communicate with the chained proxy.
      boolean requiresEncryption(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Implement this method to tell LittleProxy whether or not to encrypt connections to the chained proxy for the given request.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.littleshoot.proxy.SSLContextSource

        getSSLContext

    • Method Detail

      • getHostAndPort

        String getHostAndPort(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
        Return the host and port for the chained proxy to use. Returning null indicates that we won't chain.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The Chain Proxy with Host and Port.

      • requiresEncryption

        boolean requiresEncryption(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
        Implement this method to tell LittleProxy whether or not to encrypt connections to the chained proxy for the given request. If true, LittleProxy will call SSLContextSource.getSSLContext() to obtain an SSLContext used by the upstream proxy.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        true of the connection to the chained proxy should be encrypted

      • getTransportProtocol

        TransportProtocol getTransportProtocol()
        Tell LittleProxy what kind of TransportProtocol to use to communicate with the chained proxy.
        Returns:

      • allowFallbackToUnchainedConnection

        boolean allowFallbackToUnchainedConnection(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest httpRequest)
        Indicate whether or not it's okay to fall back to an unchained connection.
        Parameters:
        httpRequest - The HTTP request
        Returns:
